1.content: You are returning home after a crummy day at school. “Man I wish my grades weren’t so low”. You say to yourself very disappointed. A woman then appears in-front of you seemingly out of no where. “Hello little one I’m Eva the goddess of fertility”. She says with joy in her voice. “I have seen how you and your mother have not gotten along”. She then pulls out a wand. “I’m here to give you a new life with a new mother”. You look at her confused. “What does that mean”? You ask her clearly dumbfounded. “It means silly you will be able to live any life you want”. You then tell her you wish for your new mom to be. Who will your new mother be? Choose wisely.
1.title: A new day a new life

info.brief_description: You get to picks who will be your new mother
info.description: You don’t like your mother you have right now so the goddess of fertility allowed you to pick a new person or animal to be your new mother (btw this is a first person point of view so no going 2nd or 3rd person ok thanks now let the story begin)
